pros: Numerous friendships all throughout medical, psr, dental, womens and behavioral health, except for NP Brett Longacre, be wary of him. Good insurance benefits and the hours of operation.
cons: If management takes a dislike on you, they will find ways to fire you. If you committed a serious mistake, but you are liked by management, they will disregard it, but if if you are not liked, they will immediately fire you.
